messages.title: NEW! James Baker
messages.content: It's time for a fresh start for Wallasey and Moreton.

messages.title: Jeremy Corbyn's plans will push up inflation
messages.content: hitting those on fixed incomes, such as pensions. Don't risk it. Vote for James Baker.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More GP appointments, improve hospital food, support our hospices and extend the Cancer Drugs Fund.
We will ensure nobody needing care will be forced to sell their home to pay for it.
Watching a loved one's slow decline is agonising. We will double the money for research and speed up trials of new treatments.
Conservatives will continue to increase pensions by the same rate as wages or prices and no less than 2.5%.
The Winter Fuel payment, older person's bus pass and free prescriptions will be protected by the Conservatives.
Earlier diagnosis with new technology and extend the Cancer Drugs Fund to help even more people get the treatment they need.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting Brexit done with our new deal.
issues.economy: Jeremy Corbyn's plans will push up inflation - hitting those on fixed incomes, such as pensions.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.governance: A hung parliament with Scottish Nationalist Party and Lib Dems calling the shots. No progress on the country's priorities.
issues.socialWelfare: Better social care where nobody needing care will be forced to sell their home to pay for it.

housing.content: We will ensure nobody needing care will be forced to sell their home to pay for it.

contactInformation.address: both at 9 Victoria Parade, Wallasey CH45 2PH

images.caption: Promoted by Ian Lewis, on behalf of James Baker, both at 9 Victoria Parade, Wallasey CH45 2PH. Printed by Paragon CC, Unit 2B, Forward Park, Bagot Street, Birmingham, B4 7BA
